def_cn: (牧师、神职人员)认可，批准，使神圣化
def_en: If something is sanctified by a priest or other holy person, the priest or holy person officially approves of it, or declares it to be holy.

def_cn: 批准;认可;使受尊敬;使固定不变
def_en: If an organization or event sanctifies something, it makes it approved of and respected, or unable to be changed.
